attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded the app this big Cheeto  came to my house and took me hostage. Just walk in to my house straight to my room and took me. I am now being held hostage with Barron trump but it’s okay bc we’re playing roblox together. BERNIE 2020 ☺️
attributes.title: I’m being held hostage by trump 🧚🏽‍♂️💖✨🌸

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to support my president. But right after I downloaded it my entire phone crashed and I had to restart my phone! Don’t waste your time 😡
attributes.title: Horrible!

attributes.review: This app asked for my phone number and it ended up letting my text messages and calls. I deleted the app and it still sends notifications and text messages. So now I will vote for Manny. 💛🖤💛🖤
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review:
Why would anyone give this peace of crap a app it’s not even worth looking at
And god I hope people are not stupid enough to vote him back in that would be the biggest mistake the people could ever do
attributes.title: Peace of crap president #2020

attributes.review: I’m very disappointed in this app. I downloaded it to follow the President but was disappointed when it was Trump: a racist, a misogynist, a white supremacist, a killer, a rapist, and way too many adjectives to describe. I’m disappointed that the App Store carries this app.
attributes.title: A must delete...

attributes.review: I downloaded apps in my time but this one is the by far the worse Slow  needs improvement.
attributes.title: Needs improvement

attributes.review: I refuse to rate apps based on political bent. This is a well built and executed app for its goals.
attributes.title: Setting Politics Aside - A Good App

attributes.review: I downloaded this thinking it would provide me with wonderful news of our dear president but when i opened it all i saw was a dumb looking cheeto :( not my america!!!!
attributes.title: Another fake news app to make fun of our dear donald

attributes.review: This app is terrible. It glitches when you try to navigate anything. There are ads for porn every ten seconds. Every time you open it a puppy dies. 0/10 do not recommend
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way a bee should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The bee, of course, flies anyway because bees don't care what humans think is impossible.
attributes.title: Hm
